attributes.title: Hacked
attributes.review: After i downloaded this app my phone started glitching horribly. My screensaver is now permanently a trump slogan and any time i try to email someone at the bottom it says “Trump2020”

attributes.title: This isn’t a useful app
attributes.review: I have been in this app trying to find a good reason to vote for our president again but it hasn’t been useful at all!

attributes.title: doesn't work
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and it crashed my whole phone. i couldn't open it up for weeks! then when it did open i had "spyware" downloaded on my phone. all my texts where gone! i think trump stole them all! i have no idea what to do now because the only app on my phone is this one because it broke my phone ),:

attributes.title: Very glitchy app
attributes.review: I have a hard time already with my phone being almost out of storage but NOW THIS APP CRASHED MY PHONE AND MY COMPUTER! I HADENT SAVED MY SIMS GAME!!!!!!!!! I won’t stop ranting about this because I’m done when you interrupt my sims game!

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: Despite seeing all the negative views i decided that i’d give it a try. it’s extremely comical that our president would think to create an app devoted for himself. trash president. worst person ever.

attributes.title: Really...thx
attributes.review: This was just a waste of my time all this app did was lag the hell out of my phone and I couldn’t even call my dad MY DAD THE man who votes for him...so I’m never installing this app again

attributes.title: Nightmares
attributes.review: I open this app and immediately I see a orange Blob it looked like a Cheeto and a fish had a baby it was terrifying I’ve had nightmares for weeks pls don’t open this app for your own safety.

attributes.title: Hate it
attributes.review: This app is sooo bad if you actually like this app there is something wrong with you I know no one that likes this app this app is just a waste of space and useless

attributes.title: The glitches
attributes.review: The first day that I downloaded the app my phone started glitching out really bad especially in my phone calls

attributes.title: Glitches
attributes.review: Gives my phone horrible glitches.  My phone did not glitch before downloading this app.  Do not download.
